column2: We and the Poles have been in the constant state of conflict over the lands of Bohemia and Moravia, using an old claim of the Jagiellon's dynasty to justify this invasion. We must drive them back and establish a firm hold on our territories!
Force Poland to relinquish their claims over Bohemia
Force Poland to relinquish their claims over Bohemia

Our country has a history of rulership over Bohemia, we have had many claimants of our dynasty take control of the territories of Bohemia and Moravia. We must push once last time to drive out the Premyslid dynasty from Bohemia!
Transfer a state or colonial region to another country with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism
This casus-belli will conquer a state, usable on people with Byzantine cores.
This casus-belli annexes a country with nothing but byzantine cores.
This casus-belli will annex small Chinese countries with only Chinese cores
